title: Analytic Bethe Ansatz and $T$-system in $C^{(1)}_2$ vertex models
abstract: Eigenvalues of the commuting family of transfer matrices are expected to obey the $T$-system, a set of functional relation, proposed recently. Here we obtain the solution to the $T$-system for $C^{(1)}_2$ vertex models. They are compatible with the analytic Bethe ansatz and Yang-Baxterize the classical characters.
